definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.english: Everywhere he goes, he causes chaos , making his fans split their sides with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 無論他走到哪裏都製造混亂，使他的粉絲們笑破肚皮。

sentences.english: He is an incredibly funny guy. He always cracks me up whenever I saw him.
sentences.chinese: 他超級搞笑，無論何時看到他我總是笑破肚皮。

sentences.english: The dynamic comedy duo will have you splitting your sides with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 這一對生氣勃勃的喜劇搭檔能讓你笑破肚皮。

sentences.english: It makes you laugh to tears.

definition: uproarious/hilarious/to split one's sides laughing/lit. to hold one's belly with both hands
uproarious/hilarious/to split one's sides laughing/lit. to hold one's belly with both hands
cannot help laughing/unable to restrain a smile
to sway to and fro/to rock back and forth
to burst out laughing/hilarious/burst of laughter
to rock one's body backward and forward/to be convulsed (with laughter etc)
lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom)/between laughter and tears
